name: CAO - TAA Exclusive 2018 - Esteli TAA Exclusive 2018
additionalNotes: The Tobacconist's Association of America (TAA) is celebrating their 50th anniversary in 2018, and CAO is honoring the special occasion with their exclusive CAO Esteli TAA 2018 cigar. Coming in one size only (6 x 54), this limited edition offering is a bit of a mutt in the sense that it utilizes three different countries of origin for its tobacco - a Nicaraguan wrapper from Jalapa, a Honduran binder, and a zesty mix of Dominican, Honduran and Nicaraguan fillers. Limited to 1,500 boxes of 10, don't miss your chance to try this once in a lifetime milestone.
